contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of October 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED and the Superior Court’s decision is VACATED. The matter is REMANDED for reconsideration in light of our decision in Commonwealth v. Walls, 592 Pa. 557, 926 A.2d 957 (2007) and Commonwealth v. Whitmore, 590 Pa. 376, 912 A.2d 827 (2006).
